licenseskey.label: License Key
licenseskey.comment: Get license keys in your vianetz account.

theme.label: Theme
theme.comment:
Select theme to choose for PDF layouts.
You want some more themes? Check out how to build your own on our FAQ page.

pdf_template_file_first_page.label: PDF Template File for First Page
pdf_template_file_first_page.comment: This PDF file is used as a "background" PDF for the first page. The PDF file must be unilateral.

pdf_template_file.label: PDF Template File for Following Pages
pdf_template_file.comment: This PDF file is used as a "background" PDF all pages except the first page. The PDF file must be unilateral.

pdf_attachment_file.label: PDF Attachment File
pdf_attachment_file.comment: This PDF file will be attached at the end of the PDF documents. It can be used e.g. for remittance slip, AGB or revocation documents, etc.

show_taxes.label: Show Taxes
show_taxes.comment: This setting can e.g. be disabled for the so-called "Kleinunternehmer" in Germany.

show_taxrate_name.label: Show Tax Rate Name
show_taxrate_name.comment: Tax rate name is taken from Sales / Tax / Manage Tax Zones & Rates.

show_order_comments.label: Show Order Comments
show_order_comments.comment: If activated the order comments that are marked as visible to customer are shown on the PDF document.

show_full_payment_info_block.label: Show Full Payment Info Block
show_full_payment_info_block.comment: If enabled the complete information in the payment block will be shown that is delivered by the used payment extension. If disabled only the title of used payment method will be shown.

font_family.label: Font Family
font_family.comment:
Select font family for PDF documents. Please note that not all fonts do support eg. Cyrillic fonts.
For more information on how to add your own font please see our FAQ.

font_size.label: Font Size
font_size.comment:
Set font size in pixels for PDF documents.
Default: 12

enable_debug_mode.label: Enable Debug Mode
enable_debug_mode.comment:
If Debug Mode is enabled the temporary HTML document is saved in var/tmp/debug_invoice.html so that it is easier to debug.
We recommend to disable this setting in production environment.

show_header_on_every_page.label: Show Header on every Page
show_header_on_every_page.comment: If activated header (including logo etc.) will be shown on every page, otherwise only on the first page of the document.

top_margin_first_page.label: Top Margin (First Page) in Pixels
top_margin_first_page.comment:
The top margin for the first page in pdf documents.
Default: 180

top_margin.label: Top Margin in Pixels
top_margin.comment:
The top margin in pdf documents.
Default: 180

bottom_margin.label: Bottom Margin in Pixels
bottom_margin.comment:
The bottom margin for the pdf documents.
Default: 100

left_margin.label: Left Margin in Pixels
left_margin.comment:
The left margin for the pdf documents.
Default: 50

right_margin.label: Right Margin in Pixels
right_margin.comment:
The right margin for the pdf documents.
Default: 50

note.comment:

      System > Configuration > Customer Configuration.
    • The configuration of shop logo can be found at

footertext_1column.label: Footer Text, 1. Column
footertext_1column.comment:
Variables like in email templates are allowed here, e.g. you can set specific footer for shipments with {{depend is_shipment}}Only for shipments.{{/depend}}
More information on using variables in this module.

footertext_2column.label: Footer Text, 2. Column
footertext_2column.comment:
Variables like in email templates are allowed here, e.g. you can set specific footer for shipments with {{depend is_shipment}}Only for shipments.{{/depend}}
More information on using variables in this module.

footertext_3column.label: Footer Text, 3. Column
footertext_3column.comment:
Variables like in email templates are allowed here, e.g. you can set specific footer for shipments with {{depend is_shipment}}Only for shipments.{{/depend}}
More information on using variables in this module.

enable.label: Use Advanced Invoice Layout for Invoices
enable.comment: This setting defines whether the Advanced Invoice Layout extension is used for customizing the Magento invoice layout or not. If this is set to "No" the regular Magento layout will be used.

file_name.label: File Name Prefix
file_name.comment: Prefix will be added to file name, e.g. PREFIX_10000001.pdf.

enable_save_to_file.label: Save PDF invoices to file system
enable_save_to_file.comment: If this is set to yes PDF documents will be saved to filesystem with the configuration below. Please check that the files are not publicly accessible!

storage_folder.label: File Path Storage
storage_folder.comment: Invoices will be saved to that path relative to the media/ folder.

attach_to_email.label: Attach PDF to Email
attach_to_email.comment: The PDF document will be attached to the default Magento invoice transactional email that can be configured in System->Configuration->Sales Email->Invoice.

show_crosssell_products.label: Show Cross-sell Products
show_crosssell_products.comment: What are Cross-sell Products? Please find an explanation in our FAQ.

show_additional_item_attributes.label: Show additional attributes
show_additional_item_attributes.comment: Select custom attributes that should be displayed on the invoice. Hold the "Strg" key to select multiple attributes. (Only user defined attributes of types text, select, multiselect and date can be selected here.)

salutation_text.label: Salutation Text
salutation_text.comment:
If left empty, the default text will be taken.
HTML code and variables like in email templates are allowed here, e.g. {{var firstname}} {{var lastname}}.
More information on using variables in this module.

freetext.label: Free Text
freetext.comment:
HTML code and variables like in email templates are allowed here.
More information on using variables in this module.

qrcode.label: QR Code Contents
qrcode.comment:
(3rd-Party Module Required: QR Mage)
You can use the following placeholders: {{order_id}}, {{increment_id}}, {{customer_id}}, {{date}}, {{billing_address}}, {{shipping_address}}

show_coupon_code.label: Show Coupon Code
show_coupon_code.comment: If set to true the coupon code will be printed on invoice (if any).

show_checkout_attributes.label: Show Checkout Attributes
show_checkout_attributes.comment: Requires module AITOC Checkout Fields Manager.

show_tax_table.label: Show tax table
show_tax_table.comment: If activated a table with detailed tax information by tax rate is shown on the invoice.

sign_email_attachments.label: Enable Invoice Signature for PDF Email Attachments
sign_email_attachments.comment: If enabled, invoice documents that are automatically attached to emails will also be signed. Otherwise the PDF signing does only happen when someone clicks on the button "Sign Invoice" on the invoice in the backend.

advancedinvoicelayout_html.label: Advanced Invoice Layout PDFs
advancedinvoicelayout_html.comment:
This configuration is used by the Advanced Invoice Layout extension to configure the address format of the billing and shipping addresses in the PDF documents.
HTML source code is allowed.
